
<code language="sh">

if [ "$1" = "-s" ]
then
  shift
fi

subject="biz3 mailer"
if [ $# -gt 0 ]
then
  echo "$1" | grep -q "@"
  if [ $? -ne 0 ]
  then
    subject=$1
    shift
  fi
fi

to=evans@ipay.co.za
if [ $# -gt 0 ]
then
  to=$@
fi

tmp=/tmp/`basename $0`-$USER-$$.tmp

cat > $tmp

if [ `cat $tmp | wc -c | bc` -gt 1 ]
then
  cat $tmp | /opt/mutt-1.5.21/bin/mutt -e 'set content_type="text/html"' -s "$subject" $to
fi
</code>
